COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa
STRING: I hadn't completely gotten rid of my fatigue, but I woke
up easily in the morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110
STRING: I asked Phorni to wake me up just in case, but it was
apparently no use.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c
STRING: I got myself ready quickly, and made something light to
eat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132
STRING: I had already taken a shower, and got the espresso
machine going.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148
STRING: The time was five minutes to ten o' clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154
STRING: I just had to wait for Torta to arrive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184
STRING: [Phorni] “Torta will be here soon, won't she?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19a
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, she will.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0
STRING: Phorni looked at the clock like she couldn't wait.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc
STRING: After I finished the light meal that passed for my
breakfast, I had nothing to do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2
STRING: It was definitely a good thing to get ready early, but it
meant that I was fairly bored.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e8
STRING: Since I was bored, I set up the Fortelle and tapped
away at a song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x226
STRING: Phorni started singing along.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27e
STRING: I moved my gaze from the Fortelle and glanced at the
clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28a
STRING: Quite a bit of time had passed without me realizing it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b2
STRING: [Phorni] “＊sigh＊ Huh? It's already past ten.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c8
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Yeah. It is past ten. What's she doing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de
STRING: She was almost never later than she promised.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ea
STRING: I thought maybe I had forgotten to unlock the door, but
she probably would have knocked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x300
STRING: No matter how lost we were in playing, that wouldn't
have escaped both Phorni's and my attention.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x332
STRING: [Phorni] “That's strange.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x348
STRING: Phorni basically understood Torta's personality, so she
was starting to realize something wasn't right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35e
STRING: If it was Asino, I wouldn't have worried if he was thirty
minutes late.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x374
STRING: [Chris] “I'll go look for her outside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x392
STRING: [Phorni] “If you're looking outside, shouldn't you just go
to her house?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3a8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, but maybe she stopped somewhere on
the main road.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e4
STRING: [Phorni] “Humph, that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x416
STRING: [Chris] “And... Speak of the devil.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x434
STRING: I quickly opened the door and Torta suddenly answered
with a smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45c
STRING: [Torta] “Sorry! I overslept.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x472
STRING: [Chris] “Morning... Huh, so Torta oversleeps, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x490
STRING: [Torta] “Of course I do. Once every couple years.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a6
STRING: [Chris] “Well, these things happen, I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ca
STRING: I said this teasingly and Torta smiled as she silently
started getting ready.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e0
STRING: Seeing her like that gave me a bad feeling again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ec
STRING: Torta didn't give a comeback, she just worked quietly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x502
STRING: I watched her for a while, and realized what was giving
me the bad feeling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50e
STRING: Her movements were slower than normal, maybe that
was the main reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51a
STRING: I had always thought of Torta as someone who worked
quickly, but today she was slow; she moved like she
was checking each thing individually.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53a
STRING: And despite that, she never stopped smiling.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x546
STRING: Was she tired...?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x552
STRING: I thought so the day before as well, but lately Torta was
always practicing like she was possessed by something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x568
STRING: I didn't think it was just that the recital was drawing
nearer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x574
STRING: If there was another reason for it, I wanted to ask her,
but she had dodged me the day before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58a
STRING: I would probably have to ask her about it seriously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5bc
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d2
STRING: As I was wondering how to broach the subject with
Torta, Phorni called out to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e8
STRING: Torta was facing the other way, so I looked at Phorni
and mouthed, “What?” at her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x606
STRING: [Phorni] “Torta has a fever, doesn't she?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61c
STRING: A fever?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x630
STRING: [Phorni] “She's acting kind of weird. Like she's only
standing by force of will.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x646
STRING: I saw that she was acting weird.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x652
STRING: If Phorni noticed it, too, maybe something really was
wrong.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x676
STRING: [Chris] “Torta, can we talk?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a8
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? What about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6be
STRING: Torta came near and I grabbed her hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e6
STRING: [Torta] “H-Hey...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fc
STRING: [Chris] “Your hand is hot...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72e
STRING: [Torta] “Because it's cold outside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x744
STRING: [Chris] “Don't move.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76e
STRING: I said this to Torta as she tried to pull her hand away,
and then I put my other hand against her forehead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x784
STRING: She had a fever...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x790
STRING: And a pretty high one at that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79c
STRING: [Chris] “Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ce
STRING: [Torta] “Wh-What are you doing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e4
STRING: [Chris] “Why didn't you tell me you weren't feeling well?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x816
STRING: [Torta] “I feel fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x82c
STRING: [Chris] “Liar. I can tell that much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x856
STRING: I still hadn't released her hand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x862
STRING: That being said, I was gripping it lightly enough that she
could have easily pulled away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x878
STRING: Torta had tried to pull away several times already, but
she had almost no strength.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x896
STRING: [Torta] “Let me go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ac
STRING: [Chris] “If you feel fine, you should be able to free
yourself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8d4
STRING: [Torta] “That's mean...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ea
STRING: [Chris] “So you caught a cold?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91c
STRING: [Torta] “A little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x932
STRING: [Chris] “Listen. If you keep this up, we won't get any real
practice in today . You understand that much, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95a
STRING: [Torta] “No, I came here because I thought I was fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x970
STRING: [Chris] “It's impossible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99a
STRING: Even her tough words had no strength.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a6
STRING: She must have forced every step on the way here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b2
STRING: But having it pointed out to her, and admitting it, must
have drained her suddenly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c8
STRING: [Chris] “Just sit down for now. I'll get you something
warm to drink.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ec
STRING: Looking like she had finally given up, Torta silently
obeyed me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa02
STRING: Phorni was looking worriedly up at Torta's face from the
table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa18
STRING: I went into the kitchen, filled a cup with warm milk, and
returned.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa24
STRING: [Chris] “Here, drink this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa56
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6c
STRING: Torta responded tersely, and brought the cup to her
lips.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa78
STRING: I sat down next to her and thought about what to do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa84
STRING: If she had walked here, I thought she'd be fine walking
home, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9a
STRING: [Chris] “So, you didn't say anything to Ninna?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xacc
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafa
STRING: No, I didn't say anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb06
STRING: [Chris] “You've got to at least tell Ninna...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb24
STRING: [Torta] “She would have stopped me if I'd said anything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb3a
STRING: [Chris] “You knew that, so why did you come?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6c
STRING: [Torta] “It's fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb96
STRING: Torta put down her cup and heaved a big sigh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbac
STRING: I could tell how bad she felt just by looking at her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb8
STRING: [Chris] “You should just go home today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbea
STRING: [Torta] “I'll be fine if I rest for a minute. Do you know
how many days we have left to practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0a
STRING: [Chris] “Practice, practice... That's all you've said since
yesterday. Why are you so worried about it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc46
STRING: [Torta] “Because I want to give a perfect performance.
Don't make me repeat myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5c
STRING: [Chris] “It's because you haven't really answered me,
Torta. So why do you want to give a perfect
performance? Do you have to? Is it for me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc86
STRING: [Chris] “But... It's not just that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb8
STRING: [Torta] “If it's not for you, Chris, then it's for myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcce
STRING: [Chris] “You want to be a pro? Is that your dream?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd00
STRING: [Torta] “I think I do. I've been saying that since I was
little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd20
STRING: [Chris] “Is that really all?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3e
STRING: [Torta] “That's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd54
STRING: I hadn't misunderstood her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd60
STRING: But I could sense right away that was a lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd6c
STRING: [Chris] “I feel like you've been doing nothing but lying to
me since yesterday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9e
STRING: [Torta] “Why do you think that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb4
STRING: [Chris] “You're asking that question... So I can take that
as you admitting it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf0
STRING: [Torta] “I just want to know the reason for the
misunderstanding.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe06
STRING: [Chris] “That again... Talking like this won't change
anything. Just go home today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe26
STRING: [Chris] “Get a good rest, and we'll practice again when
you feel better. At a more moderate pace next time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe62
STRING: [Torta] “No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe78
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeaa
STRING: [Torta] “I can sing. If I rest for a minute, I'll be fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec0
STRING: [Chris] “No, I'm bringing you home. I'll go buy an
umbrella somewhere, so wait a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefc
STRING: [Torta] “I said no, didn't I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf12
STRING: [Chris] “I said no, too, didn't I?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf44
STRING: [Torta] “Just wait a little longer. We don't know yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5a
STRING: [Chris] “Why...? I don't understand why you're so angry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf8c
STRING: [Torta] “Just... Wait a little longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa2
STRING: [Chris] “For what? For you to feel better?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc0
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd6
STRING: If she was like this... I was going to have to force an
answer out of her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfec
STRING: To that end, it may have been a good idea to let her
rest here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1002
STRING: [Chris] “Fine. You can use my bed, so go lie down for
now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102a
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1040
STRING: Torta answered honestly, and gave another large sigh.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104c
STRING: I quickly changed the sheets and told Torta to lie down,
which she obeyed passively.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1074
STRING: I placed a chair alongside her, and watched over her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1080
STRING: Phorni said she wanted to be close, so I sat her on the
bedside table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1096
STRING: [Chris] “Just sleep a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10b4
STRING: [Torta] “It's hard to sleep with you watching me like
that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ca
STRING: [Chris] “Then should I try playing something on the
Fortelle?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e8
STRING: [Torta] “I'll start singing, so no.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10fe
STRING: [Chris] “Ah-ha-ha. I guess that's true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1114
STRING: I supposed she was still alright if she could joke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1120
STRING: Even so, the priority was getting her to sleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x112c
STRING: [Chris] “If you can't sleep, I'll go out for a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x114a
STRING: [Torta] “Where to?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1160
STRING: [Chris] “A little shopping. Is there something you want
to eat?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117e
STRING: [Torta] “If there was some fruit, I'd eat that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1194
STRING: [Chris] “That reminds me, did you eat breakfast?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b2
STRING: [Torta] “I wasn't hungry, so I didn't eat.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c8
STRING: [Chris] “Okay... Well, I'll be back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e6
STRING: [Torta] “Oh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11fc
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121a
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... It's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1230
STRING: I couldn't remember when it was that I went to Torta's
house with a cold.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1246
STRING: It was hot that day, so it must have been summer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1252
STRING: Torta stayed next to me until I fell asleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125e
STRING: [Chris] “I was going to leave, but... I think I'll wait a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1286
STRING: [Torta] “Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x129c
STRING: [Chris] “Changing the sheets tired me out...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ba
STRING: [Torta] “Weakling.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12d0
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ee
STRING: [Torta] “＊sigh＊ I suppose it's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1304
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, good night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132a
STRING: I picked up a book while sitting in the chair, doing my
best not to disturb Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1340
STRING: I knew I wouldn't actually be able to read it, so I just
grabbed one randomly off the table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1356
STRING: I flipped through the pages loudly, and tried not to
meet Torta's gaze.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x137c
STRING: As I did this, I heard the soft breathing of sleep, and
stopped turning the pages.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1392
STRING: I listened to make sure her breathing was regular, and
waited quietly for five minutes just in case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c8
STRING: When I stood up, Phorni turned her worried gaze from
Torta and faced me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13fa
STRING: [Phorni] “Are you going out?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1410
STRING: I leaned in and whispered an answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x141c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm going to go buy some fruit and an umbrella.
Can you watch Torta while I'm gone?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1458
STRING: [Phorni] “I don't mind of course, but I can't do anything,
you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146e
STRING: [Chris] “If she wakes up or anything, you can just tell me
afterwards.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14aa
STRING: [Phorni] “Right, okay. But I wonder if there's anything
else I could do...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ca
STRING: [Chris] “Why don't you sing her a lullaby? Though she
may not be able to hear you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1506
STRING: [Phorni] “Yeah, I'll do that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1530
STRING: Even Phorni's voice sounded worried for some reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x153c
STRING: Maybe my worry rubbed off on her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1548
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, give me your report later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157a
STRING: [Phorni] “Yeah, have a good trip.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1590
STRING: [Chris] “See you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ca
STRING: She could wake up at any time, so I hurried just a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e0
STRING: With all the shops lined up on the main road, they had
everything you'd normally need.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f6
STRING: I bought fruit, ingredients for risotto so we could have a
real meal, and an umbrella for when Torta went home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160c
STRING: Perhaps because umbrellas weren't normally used, I
walked around the general store many times before I
finally found one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1622
STRING: The rain wasn't very strong that day, but it was an
inconvenience at times like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1638
STRING: I thought having one around the house wouldn't get in
the way, so I tried to choose a good quality umbrella
that two people could fit under without our shoulders
poking out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1658
STRING: Taking the umbrella out of the bag would be a pain, so
I went home without using it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1696
STRING: I opened the door so as not to make a sound, and the
towel was in the entryway like always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ac
STRING: Even at times like this, I thought... But for the moment I
was grateful and wiped myself off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c2
STRING: I put everything that I bought besides the umbrella in
the kitchen, and went to the bedside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16d8
STRING: Torta was still sleeping soundly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1700
STRING: [Phorni] “She didn't wake up once.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1716
STRING: [Chris] “I see. That's good. Oh, and thanks for the towel.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1740
STRING: I tried to keep my voice down, but Torta's eyes opened
when I spoke.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1756
STRING: I sat down in the chair next to her so we could talk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x179a
STRING: [Torta] “Did you say something just now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17b0
STRING: My voice must have woken her, as Torta asked this
softly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17bc
STRING: [Chris] “I was talking to myself. You should still be
sleeping.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d2
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e8
STRING: [Chris] “How do you feel? And please, be honest.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1806
STRING: [Torta] “Still not very good...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x181c
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm, okay. How's your stomach?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x183a
STRING: [Torta] “I'm not hungry at all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1850
STRING: [Chris] “Can you eat some fruit at least? It's not good
that you haven't eaten anything today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1878
STRING: [Torta] “I never thought you'd say that to me, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1898
STRING: [Chris] “That doesn't matter. So?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b6
STRING: [Torta] “For now, I'm fine...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18cc
STRING: [Chris] “Okay. Just sleep some more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ea
STRING: [Torta] “＊sigh＊ Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1910
STRING: Before I could ask her again, Torta closed her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x191c
STRING: This time I was able to watch her carefully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1928
STRING: Her face was slightly red, perhaps from the fever.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1934
STRING: Perhaps she was having trouble breathing, as her chest
was heaving up and down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1940
STRING: I didn't know if she was cold or hot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x194c
STRING: As I wondered if there was anything else I could do,
Torta suddenly opened her eyes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x197a
STRING: [Torta] “I just can't sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1990
STRING: [Chris] “Oh. So, do you want to talk?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ae
STRING: [Torta] “About the graduation recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c4
STRING: [Chris] “Broadly speaking, that could enter into it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e2
STRING: [Torta] “You're pretty tenacious...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f8
STRING: [Chris] “Since you understand, you'll tell me, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1e
STRING: I thought she fell asleep again, but Torta continued
talking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a3c
STRING: [Torta] “Because I don't have anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a52
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a70
STRING: [Torta] “I've practiced hard for the past three years. I've
had relatively high marks from my lecturers, and it's
been fun for me to keep getting better at singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aa2
STRING: [Torta] “But what I really wanted wasn't those marks or
even to improve my singing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1afc
STRING: [Torta] “Chris, I... I like you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b12
STRING: She finally said it... That's kind of how it felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b28
STRING: But now that I'd heard it, I didn't feel any regret or
penitence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b3e
STRING: I wanted to hear all of what Torta had to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b52
STRING: [Torta] “Aren't you going to say anything?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b68
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... Just continue.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b86
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah... I like you, Chris... So I've been thinking
about what I can do for a long time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bae
STRING: [Torta] “Of I course I know that you really like Arie, so it
wasn't that I wanted you to like me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be0
STRING: [Torta] “I just wanted the memories. Since I can perform
with you at the final, most important recital, I wanted to
give the best possible performance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c12
STRING: [Torta] “I don't have any memories with you, Chris... I
don't so, I thought it would be okay just once... I
wanted to try as hard as I could, give a great
performance, and create a memory.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c4c
STRING: Perhaps tired from talking for so long, Torta closed her
eyes again, and caught her breath.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c62
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c78
STRING: I had known how Torta felt for quite a long time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c84
STRING: I almost couldn't pretend that I didn't.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c90
STRING: We had both avoided saying it, hearing it, and having
our relationship become awkward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca6
STRING: I was the one who forced her to say it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cb2
STRING: But I didn't feel any regret.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cbe
STRING: Perhaps somewhere in my heart, I had expected her to
tell me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cd4
STRING: Since I had mistakenly called her Arie...no, even before
that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cea
STRING: And at the same time, I was certain that when she told
me, I would definitely tell her this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d00
STRING: “I like Arie. I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0c
STRING: But at the time, those words wouldn't come.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d18
STRING: I heard Torta's words, and my chest hurt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d24
STRING: She was working so hard for me, and for herself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d3a
STRING: She said she only wanted one thing, a memory with me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d46
STRING: Then there was one thing I realized.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d52
STRING: I liked Torta just as much.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d5e
STRING: It was true that I had chosen one of the two.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6a
STRING: The reason was simple.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d76
STRING: I thought that Arie was the one who needed me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d82
STRING: Arie was the weak girl, and Torta was the strong one.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8e
STRING: I chose Arie for that simple, stupid idea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d9a
STRING: Of course I didn't regret that either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da6
STRING: I really did like Arie, too. My feelings still hadn't
changed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dbc
STRING: But... It was just that I realized how Torta felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dea
STRING: [Torta] “You're not going to say anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e00
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e1e
STRING: [Torta] “You don't have to apologize. I know. I know it
all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e3e
STRING: [Chris] “No. I do, too...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e54
STRING: No, what would happen if I said I liked her, too?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e60
STRING: My girlfriend was Arietta, not Tortinita.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6c
STRING: That fact wouldn't change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e78
STRING: If I put that into words, it would just hurt Torta more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e84
STRING: [Chris] “No... It's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea2
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. I'm going back to sleep. I still don't feel so
well. I'll go home tonight, so let me sleep here until
then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ecc
STRING: [Chris] “You can stay as long as you like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eea
STRING: [Torta] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f10
STRING: Torta closed her eyes and fell asleep again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f5e
STRING: Night came, and Torta looked like she was feeling a
little better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6a
STRING: She woke up many times, and she ate the fruit and
risotto, so I didn't think I had to worry about her health.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8a
STRING: She looked like she felt a little bad next to me, but she
was walking confidently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa0
STRING: [Chris] “Would it be best to take tomorrow off, too?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fd2
STRING: [Torta] “I... I don't know yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe8
STRING: [Chris] “Tell me if you think you can't practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x201a
STRING: [Torta] “You're just saying that because you want to
have the day off, Chris... But I guess there's no reason to
work so hard anymore.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x203a
STRING: [Chris] “No, I'll do my best.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206c
STRING: [Torta] “Why...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2082
STRING: [Chris] “To give the best performance, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b4
STRING: [Torta] “Oh... It'd be bad if you couldn't graduate.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ca
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e0
STRING: Seemingly relieved after confessing, Torta answered
naturally.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20f6
STRING: The feelings that had built up in her were gone, and she
looked peaceful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x211e
STRING: [Torta] “This is far enough. I'll go the rest of the way
myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2134
STRING: Torta stopped and said this on the road a little before
her house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x214a
STRING: It was so sudden, that I left Torta behind and walked a
little ahead.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2160
STRING: I hurried back to her and put the umbrella back over
Torta's head, which had gotten a little wet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2176
STRING: [Chris] “I'll walk you to the house. I won't argue about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a8
STRING: [Torta] “I said it's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21be
STRING: [Chris] “You lied to me so many times yesterday and
today, Torta. I don't believe you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21fa
STRING: [Torta] “This time it's really true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2210
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah-yeah. I'll listen when we get to your house.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2226
STRING: I tilted the umbrella a bit, being careful to not let Torta
get wet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2258
STRING: [Torta] “Ugh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x226e
STRING: Then I walked without looking at Torta's face for a
while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22bc
STRING: [Ninna] “Welcome home. You're a little late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22da
STRING: [Chris] “Excuse me. It's Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f8
STRING: [Torta] “I'm home...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230e
STRING: I folded up the still-wet umbrella and put it in a corner
of the entryway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x231a
STRING: Then I walked with Torta toward the living room table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2342
STRING: [Ninna] “Is that you, Chris...? What brings you here at
such a late hour?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2358
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry it's so late. It looks like Torta has a
cold, but she came to practice anyway. I was worried,
so I walked her home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x239e
STRING: [Torta] “It's not that big of a deal.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23bc
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ee
STRING: [Torta] “It's just a little cold. I'll feel better tomorrow
after I sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2404
STRING: [Chris] “Torta says that, but if her fever isn't down by
tomorrow, can you decide if she needs to rest, Ninna?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x245a
STRING: [Ninna] “Yes, of course. Thank you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2470
STRING: [Chris] “It's nothing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24a2
STRING: [Torta] “Anyway, we practice here tomorrow, so you'll
be here by ten o'clock?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24c2
STRING: [Chris] “It's okay, I'll be here. But if Ninna says no
practice, then no practice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24f6
STRING: [Torta] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2528
STRING: [Ninna] “Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2546
STRING: [Torta] “Yes...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2578
STRING: [Ninna] “Good. Now, did you eat something? You didn't
have breakfast, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25b4
STRING: [Torta] “I ate at Chris's place.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x25d2
STRING: [Ninna] “I see. In that case, you should just rest for
today. I'll check on you tomorrow morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x260e
STRING: [Torta] “Yes, ma'am...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x263c
STRING: Torta answered just like a scolded child, and went up
to her room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2652
STRING: For a moment, I thought to walk her to her room, but I
couldn't go that far.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2670
STRING: [Ninna] “Chris. Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2686
STRING: [Chris] “It's nothing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26a4
STRING: [Ninna] “I will give that girl a stern talking to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26ba
STRING: [Chris] “No, you don't have to do that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26d8
STRING: [Ninna] “Hehe... Alright, I'll leave the talking-to out, then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26f8
STRING: [Chris] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2716
STRING: [Ninna] “It's late today, so you go home, Chris. And I'll
see you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2736
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. Alright, please keep an eye on Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2754
STRING: [Ninna] “Leave that to me. See you tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x276a
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, good night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27d6
STRING: [Phorni] “Welcome home. How was it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27ec
STRING: [Chris] “I'm back. It wasn't really anything, I just walked
her home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2828
STRING: [Phorni] “But she said she likes you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x283e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2870
STRING: [Phorni] “So you didn't think anything about that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2886
STRING: [Chris] “Of course I did, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28b8
STRING: [Phorni] “But? Is it about Arie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x28ce
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah... I have Arie, so I can't do anything.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2900
STRING: [Phorni] “So... What if you didn't have Arie?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2916
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2948
STRING: [Phorni] “If there was no Arie... Would you like Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2968
STRING: [Chris] “That's a meaningless hypothesis. In reality, I like
Arie and I'm with her. I can't think what it would be like
if she wasn't there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ae
STRING: [Phorni] “But you know, don't you? You have an answer
for whether or not you'd like Torta if Arie wasn't there,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29ce
STRING: [Chris] “If so... Then what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a00
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, that's obvious, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a16
STRING: [Chris] “If we're working on that meaningless
hypothesis.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a48
STRING: [Phorni] “I... I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a5e
STRING: [Chris] “I like Torta. But not the same way I like Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a9a
STRING: [Phorni] “How is it different?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ab0
STRING: [Chris] “Arie is my girlfriend, Torta... She's my childhood
friend.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ace
STRING: [Phorni] “Not whether or not she's your girlfriend...
Umm... So if Torta had said she liked you first, Chris,
would Torta be your girlfriend?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2af8
STRING: [Chris] “No... But if she had told me honestly like she
did today, I don't think I know. I had some stupid ideas
about Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b22
STRING: [Chris] “If she had shown me her vulnerable side like
that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b54
STRING: [Phorni] “You may have been with her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b6a
STRING: [Chris] “You're rather talkative today...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b9c
STRING: [Phorni] “You are too, Chris. Anyway, thanks for
answering seriously.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bb2
STRING: [Chris] “Why are you thanking me like that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bd0
STRING: [Phorni] “Because you gave a serious answer to my
serious question.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2be6
STRING: [Chris] “I'd do that for anyone... But maybe I just
wanted to tell someone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c22
STRING: [Phorni] “That's fine, too. I'll listen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c38
STRING: Phorni said this kindly to me, in a more adult tone than
normal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c4e
STRING: She seemed like someone else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c5a
STRING: [Chris] “But... I don't have anything else to say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c78
STRING: [Phorni] “That's fine, too. Just tell me if you want me to
listen again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c98
STRING: [Chris] “I don't think I will...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cb6
STRING: [Phorni] “Yeah. Then can I ask you one more thing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ccc
STRING: [Chris] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2cea
STRING: [Phorni] “You like Torta, don't you Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d00
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d32
STRING: [Phorni] “Sorry, I'll revise that. You like Torta as well,
don't you Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d52
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d84
STRING: [Phorni] “Good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d9a
STRING: [Chris] “Why do you think that's good, Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2db8
STRING: [Phorni] “I... I like both Arie and Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2dce
STRING: [Chris] “But what I'm doing is wrong to both of them.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de4
STRING: Phorni smiled and shook her head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2df0
STRING: Then she said her final words with no time to ask what
she meant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e18
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, it's late today so I'll disappear. I'll wake
you up if it looks like you'll sleep in tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e4e
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e64
STRING: The way she was acting, I didn't think she'd tell me
what she meant the next day, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e7a
STRING: Because she liked both Arie and Torta...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e86
STRING: It was just like she was talking about me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e92
STRING: Why was that not a bad thing?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e9e
STRING: [Chris] “Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eb4
STRING: I called out to her again, knowing she probably
wouldn't appear again today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2eca
STRING: Thinking about what she meant, I lay down on the bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ed6
STRING: But I didn't think I could sleep yet.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ef4
STRING: I thought of Torta with my eyes closed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f00
STRING: The bed had gotten cold, but she had been there until a
short while ago.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f16
STRING: It made me feel embarrassed, and I tried not to think
about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f22
STRING: But the more I thought about that, the more I thought
about Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f38
STRING: I needed to sleep...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f44
STRING: I had an early start tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f50
STRING: I was the healthy one; if I was late, Torta would give me
an earful.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f66
STRING: I tossed and turned going over those things in my head,
and at some point I fell asleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fae
STRING: [Torta] “Chris, I... I liked you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fc4
STRING: [Chris] “Liked...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fe2
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, for a long time. Since we were kids. You
knew, didn't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3002
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3020
STRING: [Torta] “But I knew that you liked Arie, Chris. And of
course, I knew Arie liked you, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3052
STRING: [Torta] “I was always jealous when I saw you. I thought
it'd be nice if I could spend time with you like that. But I
knew it was impossible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3084
STRING: [Torta] “So in the end, I just had that one feeling. I
thought I mustn't be a problem for you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30a4
STRING: [Chris] “A problem...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30c2
STRING: [Torta] “No, I know. You don't have to try anymore.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x30e2
STRING: [Chris] “No, I'll try. Even from tomorrow. As long as you
feel better, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x310a
STRING: [Torta] “For who...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3120
STRING: [Chris] “Of course...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x313e
STRING: [Torta] “No, it's for Arie. If you don't graduate, you can't
see her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x315e
STRING: [Chris] “Torta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x317c
STRING: [Torta] “That's how it is. Let's just do what we can
starting tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x319c
STRING: Torta said this in the happiest voice she could while still
lying in bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3208
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, this is far enough.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x321e
STRING: Torta said this while putting her shoes on in the
entryway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x322a
STRING: As far as I could hear from her voice, I didn't need to
worry about her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3240
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x324c
STRING: [Chris] “I'm walking you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x327e
STRING: [Torta] “It's fine. Save that kind of thing for Arie back
home. I'm sure Arie needs it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32ba
STRING: [Torta] “I'm fine by myself... You bought this umbrella.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32d0
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3302
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, I'll take this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3318
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x334a
STRING: [Torta] “So, see you tomorrow? What about practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3360
STRING: [Chris] “We'll practice, of course... As long as you feel
better, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x339c
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, gotcha. Alright my house at the usual
time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x33b2
STRING: [Chris] “I'll be there on time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x340a
STRING: Torta left without replying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3416
STRING: I had known how Torta felt for quite a long time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3422
STRING: I almost couldn't pretend that I didn't.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x342e
STRING: We had both avoided saying it, hearing it, and having
our relationship become awkward.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3444
STRING: I was the one who forced her to say it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3450
STRING: And I regretted it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x345c
STRING: I knew it could only end up like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3468
STRING: But I deeply, deeply, regretted it.
